Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.scoredist

Interface ScoreDistributionReader

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
H2ScoreDistributionReader, TextFileScoreDistributionReader
public interface ScoreDistributionReader extends Closeable
Interface for score distribution reading.
Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe

  • Method Details

    • readForTermCountAndObject

      ObjectScoreDistribution readForTermCountAndObject(int termCount, TermId objectId) throws PhenolException
      Read for the given termCount and objectId.
      Parameters:
      termCount - The number of terms to read for.
      objectId - The "world object" ID to read for.
      Returns:
      ObjectScoreDistribution with the empirical distribution for the query.
      Throws:
      PhenolException - In the case of problems when reading and parsing.

    • readForTermCount

      ScoreDistribution readForTermCount(int termCount) throws PhenolException
      Read and return entries for score distribution given a specific termCount.
      Parameters:
      termCount - The number of terms to return the score distribution for.
      Returns:
      ScoreDistribution for the given termCount.
      Throws:
      PhenolException - In the case of problems when reading or parsing.

    • readAll

      Map<Integer,ScoreDistribution> readAll() throws PhenolException
      Read all entries and return mapping from term count to ScoreDistribution object.
      Returns:
      Resulting score distributions from the file.
      Throws:
      PhenolException - In the case of problems when reading or parsing.
